result.title: Senior Software Engineer
result.description:
Job Requirements:
• BS Degree in Computer Science (or related technical equivalent)
• 3+ years of Software Development experience, 5+ years preferred
• Experience with C#/Java, .Net core, RESTful API, , CSS 3, HTML 5, JavaScript, Typescript, JSON
• Experience with frameworks like Bootstrap, React.
• Experience with VSTS, Azure Pipeline, Builds and Releases (Optional)
• Experience with API publishing and certification
• Strong background in automated testing tool-set on both traditional and Cloud systems with coverage on API, Azure based Micro services,
• Good experience in dealing with the complexities arising from interface incompatibilities and building solutions to quickly identify the breakages
• Knowledge of client- and server-side web app performance scaling techniques;
• Knowledge of both SQL and NoSQL data stores and familiarity in performing Load and stress testing using automated tools
• Working knowledge of Linux and Windows
• Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skill
